Koszt stały, wolny od oceny arkusza medycznego: 210 zł/mc/1 os.
Medium+

- 19 specjalistów (m.in. ginekolog, okulista, dermatolog, kardiolog, urolog, laryngolog, neurolog, ortopeda, chirurg, diabetolog, onkolog, ginekolog-onkolog, chirurg onkolog, chirurg naczyniowy, hematolog, hepatolog, nefrolog) w nielimitowanym zakresie

Koszt stały, wolny od oceny arkusza medycznego: 248 zł/mc/1 os.
Complex+
- internista/pediatra nielimitowanym zakresie
- 67 specjalistów (wszyscy dostępni w Medicover) w nielimitowanym zakresie
- kompleksowe badania diagnostyczne
- 4 wizyty domowe/rok
- 1 szczepienie przeciwko grypie

Koszt (na tym etapie): nieznany.
Punk wyjścia dla nas do wyceny kosztów opieki stanowi załączony kwestionariusz medyczny.
trans:
- 1 inspection of mouth/year
- emergency ambulance service
Fixed rate, free from medical sheet rating: PLN 210/month/person
Medium+
- unlimited service of internist/pediatrist
19 professionals ((including gynecologist, ophthalmologist, dermatologist, cardiologist, urologist, ENT specialist, neurologist, orthopedist, surgeon, diabetologist, oncologist, gynecological oncologist, oncological surgeon, vascular surgeon, hematologist, hepatologist, nephrologist) to an unlimited extent
- advanced diagnostic tests
- 2 home visits/year
- 1 flue vaccination
- 1 mouth inspection/year
- emergency ambulance service
Fixed cost, free from medical sheet rating: PLN 248/month/person
Complex+
- unlimited service of internist/pediatrist
- 67 professionals (all of them available at Medicover) in unlimited scope
- all-around diagnostic tests
- 4 home visits/year
- 1 flu vaccination
1 - mouth inspection/year
- 30 physiotherapy sessions/year
- travel insurance up to PLN 175,000/year
Cost (at this moment): unknown.
Starting point for us to estimate care expenses is the attached medical questionnaire.
